scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=local LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.start:sit: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=sit LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=dev USE_VERSION=yes webpack --mode development --progress
scripts.build:sit: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=sit USE_VERSION=yes webpack --mode development --progress
scripts.build:uat: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=uat USE_VERSION=yes webpack --mode development --progress
scripts.build:grey: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=grey USE_VERSION=yes webpack --mode development --progress
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=prod PROD=true  USE_VERSION=no webpack --mode production --progress
scripts.pub:dev: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:dev && deploy-test -S DEV
scripts.pub:sit: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:sit && deploy-test
scripts.pub:uat: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:uat && deploy-test -S UAT
scripts.pub:grey: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:grey && deploy-test -S GREY
